problem.markdown:
1. Characteristic of high voltage rating Circuit Breaker :-
() Capability of interrupting capacitive and inductive circuits and fault currents of all values within their rating () High reliability electrically and mutually () Slower time response (x) Both High reliability electrically and mutually and Capability of interrupting capacitive and inductive circuits and fault currents of all values within their rating
2. The function of __________ is to isolate the part of the power system in case of abnormal conditions.
() Isolator () All (x) Circuit Breaker () Insulator
3. In oil circuit breaker (O.C.B) the range exists between
(x) 25MVA at 2.5 kV and 5000MVA at 250kV () 7.5MVA at 2.5 kV and 50000MVA at 250kV () 75MVA at 2.5 kV and 50000MVA at 250kV () 250MVA at 2.5 kV and 5000MVA at 250kV
4. Advantages of using Air blast Circuit breakers :
(x) Short arc duration () Sensitivity to restricting voltage () Current chopping () All
5. In SF6 Circuit breaker ________
() No reduction of dielectric strength (x) All () No risk of fire () Current chopping tendency is minimized
problem.p: 1. Characteristic of high voltage rating Circuit Breaker :-

choicegroup.choice: Capability of interrupting capacitive and inductive circuits and fault currents of all values within their rating
Both High reliability electrically and mutually and Capability of interrupting capacitive and inductive circuits and fault currents of all values within their rating

problem.p: 2. The function of __________ is to isolate the part of the power system in case of abnormal conditions.
3. In oil circuit breaker (O.C.B) the range exists between
